CONFIG.description: The configuration for a trivia session.

bot_plays.description: Whether or not the bot gains points during the session.

delay.description: The maximum number of seconds permitted to answer a question, must be a positive number greater than or equal to 4.0.

max_score.description: Number of points required in order to win the trivia, must be a positive integer.

payout_multiplier.description: The payout multiplier, must be a positive number or zero.

reveal_answer.description: Whether or not to reveal the answer when the question times out.

timeout.description: Number of seconds that need to pass until trivia stops due to no response, must be a positive number greater than 0.0.

use_spoilers.description: Whether to hide the answers in spoilers when revealing the question's answers.
